Munna Bhai challenges the conventional method of 'common-sense treatment'
directly challenges Asthana's conventional opinions to get under his skin
constantly seeks to impose a more empathetic and almost holistic regimen around himself
lack of empathy towards patients, especially those who are deemed incurable by conventional medicine
his behavior is well-received by the hospital staff and patients
perceiving this as chaos
resorts to laughter therapy to deal with his stress
unaware that she is 'Chinki'
uses old-fashioned kindness and love to 'cure' many patients at the hospital

friends in the process
befriends Zaheer, a man dying from stomach cancer who he meets on his first day of college

Munna, a patient with stomach cancer, befriends the college dean Asthana during his treatment. Asthana tries to expel Munna due to a stripper episode, but he is prevented from doing so after injuring himself.
Munna's friend Zaheer dies, leaving Munna in shock and causing him to give up during a test.
Paraplegic patient Anand Banerjee, who has been brain-dead for 12 years, comes back to life after Munna's 'miraculous' treatments. His recovery is attributed to Munna.
After learning of Suman's true identity, Munna marries her and they open a real hospital in Munna's family village together.
Circuit becomes friends with Munna during his treatment, and later gets married and has a son named 'Short Circuit'.
After learning of Anand Banerjee's recovery, Suman gives a heartfelt speech defending Munna's actions. Asthana is moved and changes his opinion about Munna.
After Anand Banerjee recovers, Suman falls in love with him, but it is revealed that he was already married and had died years ago.
After hearing news of Munna's 'miraculous' treatments, Munna's parents return to the city and forgive him.
After injuring himself to stay in the hospital, Munna prevents Asthana from expelling him due to a stripper episode.
The patients, students, and hospital staff stand in Asthana's way and refuse to let Munna leave after he recovers from his injuries.
After Munna gives up during the test, Asthana is finally moved by Suman's heartfelt speech and changes his opinion about Munna.
